001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.io;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.FileInputStream;
005import java.io.FileOutputStream;
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.util.zip.ZipEntry;
008import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream;
009
010public interface ZipFiles {
011
012    static void unzip(File zipFile, File destDir) throws IOException {
013        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];
014        ZipInputStream zis = new ZipInputStream(new FileInputStream(zipFile));
015        ZipEntry zipEntry = zis.getNextEntry();
016        while (zipEntry != null) {
017            File newFile = newFile(destDir, zipEntry);
018            if (zipEntry.isDirectory()) {
019                if (!newFile.isDirectory() && !newFile.mkdirs()) {
020                    throw new IOException("Failed to create directory " + newFile);
021                }
022            } else {
023                // fix for Windows-created archives
024                File parent = newFile.getParentFile();
025                if (!parent.isDirectory() && !parent.mkdirs()) {
026                    throw new IOException("Failed to create directory " + parent);
027                }
028
029                FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(newFile);
030                int len;
031                while ((len = zis.read(buffer)) > 0) {
032                    fos.write(buffer, 0, len);
033                }
034                fos.close();
035            }
036            zipEntry = zis.getNextEntry();
037        }
038        zis.closeEntry();
039        zis.close();
040    }
041
042    private static File newFile(File destinationDir, ZipEntry zipEntry) throws IOException {
043        File destFile = new File(destinationDir, zipEntry.getName());
044
045        String destDirPath = destinationDir.getCanonicalPath();
046        String destFilePath = destFile.getCanonicalPath();
047
048        if (!destFilePath.startsWith(destDirPath + File.separator)) {
049            throw new IOException("Entry is outside of the target dir: " + zipEntry.getName());
050        }
051        return destFile;
052    }
053}
